doubledoors-fabric.duskconfig.title: Double Doors Config
doubledoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_enabl: Whether the recursive opening feature should be enabled. This allows you to for example build a giant door with trapdoors which will all open at the same time, as long as they are connected. The 'recursiveOpeningMaxBlocksDistance' config option determines how far the function should search.
doubledoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_recur: How many blocks the recursive function should search when 'enableRecursiveOpening' is enabled.
doubledoors-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_enabl: When enables, the mod works with double doors.
When enables, the mod works with double fence gates.
When enables, the mod works with double trapdoors.
